name: SwingMusic
short_description: Beautiful music player with a modern web interface.
description: Beautiful music player with a modern web interface. SwingMusic is a self-hosted application focused on media, entertainment, music, audio. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose. It supports a wide range of use cases for homelabs and self-hosted infrastructure.
usecases: Self-host SwingMusic on your home server to beautiful music player with a modern web interface without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use SwingMusic to manage your media workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
